name: Soda Approval
description:
Soda Approval is a game about sodas. You start working in a factory that produces sodas and you are tasked with approving or disapproving the soda bottles that you are presented with. 

You can buy lots of upgrades that give you more Currency and more Customer Happiness and more. 

You can buy new bottles with new cool looks that also give you more Currency and Happiness.
